callout: RECEIVE A GUN IN THE MAIL.
middlesex:
They say in a realm of junk, he with the largest garage is king. Boy, let me tell you, do we have a shoebox with your name on it.

The only Magic deck that costs 15 dollars per game, this smutshack of a junkyard stores its treasure in the tried and true methods of the target audience: 12-year-olds.
doubletickle: DISCOVER THE POWER OF DRAFT COMMONS
doublesex:
Rummage in the jumbage to your sprocket's content: This deck features the only keyword guaranteed to cause a rules infraction (and one of these decks has mutate).

Is it a pile of garbage or a priceless machine? Only you can shake that shoebox.
commandersex:
The only Broumvirate character to ever get away with murder, Dick Chutney has been dormant in his mountain of carefully named firearm parts.

He's back, more handsome than ever, and now he's doing the confiscating.

decksplay.ben: Have You Ever Ben In Love?

deckliners.ben: Have You Ever Ben In Love?
